This post regards these characters      

Chars Involved(Besides mine): Tor=
ca

(I put this just incase anybody controlling the included characters mis=
ses this post, that way, instead of somebody missing a post which involves =
their char(s), they can just read this part and say "Hey, this post involve=
s me, I better read")
                            
::The Elements Group::

=
           The plant command center was now 80% grown.  Ringalish=E9 then g=
ave out a command.

           "Listen, now, we will go and seek these "tra=
nsformers" the Abyss have spoke of.  Covertax, you and I will go search.  A=
lvatar, I had intended to bring you, but, seeing that we are unable to prov=
ide structural defence, I want you to stay behind and defend the base.  Do =
you all understand?" He said.

           Alvatar nodded and said yes, then=
 got in a guard-like stance.

         Covertax grinned schemingly, and wal=
ked up to Ringalish=E9.  Covertax and Ringalish=E9 chose the element of air=
 to help them travel, and before you could blink they gusted off like wind,=
 actually, as wind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Skulletro=
n::

       Skulletron's anger spurt went off again.  He stomped off toward=
s Torca, mechfluid leaking as he went.  Then, he saw Torca talking to whoev=
er(Spears and Smokescreen?).

       Skulletron walked up to Torca, grabbed=
 him by the neck, lifted him up, and squeezed superly duperly hard, attempt=
ing to either choke him to death or crush his neck.
